CustomField.formula:
case(
case ( Primary_Contact__r.Lead_Score__c, "A" , 2 , "B" , 1 , "C", (-1) , 0 ) + if( and ( ITAR__c , Total_Qty_CNC__c > 0 ) , 1 , 0 ) + if( and ( Account.X2021_Strategic_Target__c , Total_Qty_CNC__c > 0 ) , 1 , 0 ) + if ( and ( Total_Qty_CNC__c >= 6 , Total_Qty_CNC__c <= 25 ) , 1 , 0 ) + if ( Total_Qty_HPMultJetFusion__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + if ( and ( Total_Amt_Additive__c >= 1000, Total_Amt_Additive__c <= 2500 ) , 1 , 0 ) + if ( and ( Total_Qty_Additive__c >= 11 , Total_Qty_Additive__c <=15 ) , 1 , 0 ) + if ( Amount >= 50000 , 0.5 , 0 ) + if ( Amount >= 100000 , 0.5 , 0 ) + if ( Amount >= 250000 , 0.5 , 0 ) + if ( ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c ) , 1 , 0 ) + if ( or ( Primary_Contact__r.Customer_Status_HS__c = "Churned" , Primary_Contact__r.Customer_Status_HS__c = "Churn Risk" , Primary_Contact__r.Customer_Status_HS__c = "Extreme Churn Risk" ) , 1 , 0 )
,
11.5, 4, 11, 4, 10.5, 4, 10, 4, 9.5, 4, 9, 4, 8.5, 4, 8, 4, 7.5, 4, 7, 4, 6.5, 4, 6, 4, 5.5, 4, 5, 4, 4.5, 4, 4, 4, 3.5, 3, 3, 3, 2.5, 2, 2, 2, 1 )
CustomField.label: Priority Score
